# Can we identify App nonresponders during the first week of treatment?

```{r, echo = FALSE}
tbl_cart_only %>%
  select(sensitivity,specificity) %>%
  round(., digits = 3) %>%
  kable(booktabs = TRUE, align = rep('c',2),
        col.names = c("Sensitivity","Specificity"),
        row.names = TRUE,
        escape = FALSE,
        caption = "CART Only") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, latex_options = c("HOLD_position"))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
tbl_overall %>%
  select(sensitivity,specificity) %>%
  round(., digits = 3) %>%
  kable(booktabs = TRUE, align = rep('c',2),
        col.names = c("Sensitivity","Specificity"),
        row.names = TRUE,
        escape = FALSE,
        caption = "Overall Decision Rule") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, latex_options = c("HOLD_position"))
```

# Is response status at week 8 predictive of weight loss at month 3?

```{r, echo = FALSE}
tbl_mod %>%
  round(., digits = 3) %>%
  kable(booktabs = TRUE, align = rep('c',4),
        col.names = c("Estimate", "Std. Error", "z value", "Pr(>|z|)"),
        row.names = TRUE,
        escape = FALSE,
        caption = "Estimates of Parameters in a Logistic Regression Model") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, latex_options = c("HOLD_position"))
```
